mapper.insert: insert into member (member_id, password, name, email, address, phone, role) values (#{memberId}, #{password}, #{name}, #{email}, #{address}, #{phone}, 'USER')
mapper.select: select exists(select 1 from member where member_id = #{memberId})
select member_id from member where email = #{email}
select exists(select 1 from member where member_id = #{memberId} and email = #{email})
mapper.update: update member set password = #{password} where member_id = #{memberId}
